elfarol

Class AgentMarkov

  • java.lang.Object
    • elfarol.AgentMarkov
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent

    public class AgentMarkov
extends java.lang.Object
implements Agent
    Agent that predicts bar attendance using a Markov Chain, mapping previous attendance to expected attendance

    • Method Detail

      • isAttending

        public boolean isAttending()
        Description copied from interface: Agent
        Returns the value of attend.
        Specified by:
        isAttending in interface Agent
        Returns:
        true if the agent attends the bar in the current time step (if called after the Agent.updateAttendance() function); false otherwise

      • updateAttendance

        public void updateAttendance()
        Description copied from interface: Agent
        Makes the agent update its attendance level based on its attendance prediction. This is called by the model after Agent.updatePredictions() and prior to Agent.isAttending()
        Specified by:
        updateAttendance in interface Agent

      • updatePredictions

        public void updatePredictions()
        Description copied from interface: Agent
        Scheduled update method for the agent's predictions. This is called by the model every tick prior to Agent.updateAttendance() and can be used to update the agent's beliefs prior to making predictions. Agents which do not require scheduled beliefs updating do nothing when this method is called.
        Specified by:
        updatePredictions in interface Agent
